xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 12 Kilesagocchaka, Kusalattika » 12.5 Saṃkilesasaṃkilesikaduka, Kusalattika » 12.5.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Kilesagocchaka, Kusalattika
Saṃkilesasaṃkilesikaduka, Kusalattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
20.
2346Saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2347Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2348(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
21.
2349Kilesañceva saṃkilesikañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṃkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
2350Saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
2351Kilesañceva saṃkilesikaṃ akusalañca saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṃkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
22.
2352Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ, kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
23.
2353Saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2354Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2355(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
<< 12.5.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup12.6 Kilesasaṃkiliṭṭhaduka, Kusalattika >>
